title: IExtrudeFeatureData2.FlipSideToCut
description: Gets or sets whether to flip the side to cut.
returns: True flips the side to cut, false does not
remarks:
This property is relevant only for cut features.
If the sketch is open, then the first edge in the array returned by
ISketch::GetContourEdges
and
ISketch::IGetControuEdges
is cut.
